title: Constant Width to Height Ratio
description: In this lab, we will explore how to create a constant width to height ratio for elements with varying widths. By using the padding-top property on a ::before pseudo-element, we can ensure that the height of the element remains proportionate to its width. This technique can be used to create responsive squares and other shapes with specific aspect ratios.

meta.title: Constant Width to Height Ratio: Responsive Design Techniques
meta.description: Learn how to create a constant width to height ratio for elements with varying widths using CSS.
